I've been told (and it seems that) most of the sfx are there. The main differences are changes of camera angle and differences in the dialogue. And the inclusion or deletion of various (short) parts.

I'm glad you appreciate the upload, and big thanks to MadVillian for allowing me to upload it. I've been dying to see it, and I'm sure you guys have too.

I believe there are a few people trying a mix between the DVD and the Workprint, but we'll see what happens.

Enjoy the movie.!.!.!
a 9 v 9 funny movie thx horrorspoke
